TopicTitle: Move two Kerbals at once? It's possible? How?

Articles.Content:
How can I achieve two Kerbals move simultaneously during an EVA?

Maybe with the multiplayer mod, but there is other options?

Thanks

Not that I know of...

The obvious question is why do you want to? Your problem may have another solution ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Something like this

Ah, ok - in that case I have no idea. I thought you were trying to perform a fast crew transfer or something ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Trying to make Kerbal Space Program meets Final Fantasy VIII? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Anyway looks like EVA Follower, linked above, does it. Maybe Burn Together will work for EVAs as well?

> 
> Maybe Burn Together will work for EVAs as well?

No it doesn't... EVA follower is the only option.

Yeah! Thnk u so much! That's exactly what I was searching ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The version supported of the EvaFollower mod is 0.25 but it works prefectly on 0.90
